DOC.brief_summary: To compare ocular tolerance , safety ocular pharmacokinetics 3 concentration ( 0.5 % - 1.0 % - 1.5 % ) vehicle T1225 .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Ocular Pharmacokinetics After 1 Drop T1225 0.5 , 1 1.5 % 48 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The present phase I clinical trial perform order investigate ocular tolerance , safety ocular pharmacokinetics single administration T1225 eye drop ( 0.5 % , 1.0 % , 1.5 % ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 45 year old ; Written inform consent ; Healthy volunteer ( without ocular symptom ) ; Normal ocular examination eye ( correct visual acuity ( VA ) > = 6/10 slit lamp examination without clinical relevant abnormality tear breakup time ( BUT ) > = 10 second lachrymal secretion Schirmer test > = 10 mm 5 minute lissamine green test total score < 4 ) . Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month ; Conjunctival hyperaemia score > = 2 , water score > = 2 , folliculopapillary conjunctivitis score > = 2 , number fluoresceinstained punctuation > = 10 ; Blepharitis , conjunctivitis , uveitis ; Ocular laser treatment within last 3 month ; Ocular surgery , include LASIK PRK , within last 12 month ; Topical ocular treatment last month ; Ocular antibiotic within last 7 day ; Medication study ( except paracetamol contraceptive ) .
